title: 3115 error
message:
This Macbook pro has this problem: [url]http://static.yoreparo.com/imagenes/subidas/1760763-Captura.PNG[/url]

I replaced HDD and hdd cable 2 times. Mostly it works, but sometimes appears this circle. What I can try more?

title: 3115 error
message: No idea, but normally this is a bad HDD cable or bad HDD or corrupt OSX. Bad RAM could be but that would be last on the list.
